content: *click through to website for free single size version of this pattern * this beehive textured women s beanie crochet pattern was designed with the girl next-door in mind it s beehive beanie hat pattern that includes instructions for five sizes and optional stripes a beehive beanie is all the rage this season and when you add stripes it just takes it over the top - from common to awesome the women s winter beanie pattern is a written pattern with photo tutorials where things might be complicated skill level advanced beginner sizes 3 - 7 19 7 - 14 20 women s small 21 women s medium 22 women s large 23 hook size m/n 9 00 mm yarn size 6 super bulky yarn 84 yards mc and 30 yards cc stitches chain single_crochet half_double_crochet hdc2tog half-double_crochet two together slip_stitch special stitch striping instruction provided via photo tutorial please contact me via ravelry convo if you have any trouble with the pattern and i will do everything possible to help you create a beautiful finished product
